name: NBCNews
text: JUST IN: VP Pence will publicly receive a Covid-19 vaccine on Friday, while President-elect Biden is expected to receive the vaccine as soon as next week. https://t.co/qL5O11Bb2y

name: NBCNews
text: NEW: Honda is recalling over 1.4M vehicles in the U.S. to repair drive shafts that can break, window switches that can overheat and a software flaw. https://t.co/Kiw5DINcWV

name: NBCNews
text: Public health officials are warning of scammers who promise early access to the vaccine for people who hand over their Social Security Number to callers: "You will not be asked for money to enhance your ranking for vaccine eligibility." https://t.co/Bor4TjZkmu

name: NBCNews
text:
RT @PhilMcCausland: Earlier this month, I broke that private EMS services had begged the feds for support because they were "at a breaking point."

Today, HHS announced "Ambulance, or transportation services providers, will be receiving $1.48 billion in Phase 3 funding."
https://t.co/ymzYO4MCk7 https://t.co/CQuMxNSoQy

name: NBCNews
text: The city of 820 people and its mayor have attracted attention for defying state health orders aimed at combatting the spread of the coronavirus. https://t.co/ig0M2tVgBT

name: NBCNews
text: Tyson Foods terminated seven employees from an Iowa pork plant following an independent investigation into allegations that management wagered on how many workers would get infected with Covid-19, the meat processing giant has announced. https://t.co/BvB2LZ9yZJ

name: NBCNews
text: President Trump has come so close to firing FBI Director Wray in recent months that the White House counselâ€™s office has warned him not to do so because it could put him in potential legal jeopardy, senior administration official says. https://t.co/0nM24ILdSN
